Score.description: A numeric score to be displayed as stars rating. Supports value from 1-5. Half points are not supported.

Label.description: A label to provide additional information to the rating score, e.g. total votes received for the rating score.

IconOn.description: Supported in iOS only. Custom icon to replace default filled star icon.

IconOff.description: Supported in iOS only. Custom icon to replace default empty star icon.

Styles.description: Style to be applied on the `RatingItem`.

Label.description: The string value is a style class name for `Label`.

IconOn.description: The string value is a style class name for `IconOn`. Only applicable if `IconOn` property is defined.

IconOff.description: The string value is a style class name for `IconOff`. Only applicable if `IconOff` property is defined.

Score.description: The string value is a style class name for `Score`. This style class is applicable to `IconOn` and `IconOff` as well if the respective properties do not have custom style defined.
